Taunton.Abiathar King Williams House:
The Abiathar King Williams House is a historic house located at 43 Ingell Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story, wood-framed house was begun in 1843 by Abiathar King Williams, member of the locally prominent Williams family, and finished by his brother George. It has simple vernacular Greek Revival styling, mainly in its front door surround, which has sidelight windows, and pilasters supporting an entablature.
